voice_instruct: Middle-aged man, precise and haunted diction. Trent Reznor's controlled rage meets the disciplined restraint of a Japanese Noh theater vocalist. Whispered passages of haiku-like brevity explode into industrial screams. Voice carries the weight of a man forced to kill against every moral fiber. Shakuhachi breath control in vocal delivery.

tracks.title: Truthless
tracks.prompt: industrial Japanese traditional fusion, opening: solo shakuhachi flute in empty space, then massive Nine Inch Nails distorted bass and mechanical drums crash in, taiko drums layered with industrial kick patterns, 100 BPM relentless, verse: haiku-paced vocal delivery over minimal industrial texture and shamisen, chorus: full NIN wall of noise with taiko thunder, male vocals shifting between Noh theater control and industrial screaming
tracks.lyrics:
[intro - shakuhachi solo]

[verse 1 - haiku pacing, each line separated by silence]
White stone on my chest,
Truthless, they declared me so,
I obey and kill,

The stone says I must,
Whoever holds it commands,
My blade their justice,

[chorus - industrial explosion]
Truthless! Truthless! I am the weapon they wield!
Truthless! Truthless! I am the blood on the field!
Shin meadows burning in my memory,
While my hands perform their ceremony!

[verse 2 - haiku pacing]
Barefoot on the stone,
Shin believe the ground is holy,
I have walked on graves,

Each king that I killed,
Was a prayer I couldn't speak,
Forgiveness denied,

[chorus]
Truthless! Truthless! I am the weapon they wield!
Truthless! Truthless! I am the blood on the field!
Shakuhachi screaming through the industrial waste,
Every death a note in sequence placed!

[bridge - taiko drums only, building]
I did not choose this,
I did not choose this,
The stone chose for me,
The stone chose for me,

[outro - shakuhachi returns over fading distortion]
Truthless in a world of lies,
The most honest man alive

tracks.title: Assassin in White
tracks.prompt: industrial Japanese traditional fusion, kinetic and violent: rapid taiko patterns merged with breakbeat industrial drums, 130 BPM aggressive, shamisen riffs played through heavy distortion pedals, male vocal switching between whispered Japanese-influenced phrasing and screamed industrial rage, moments of absolute silence before violent sonic attacks
tracks.lyrics:
[verse 1 - whispered, precise]
White clothes for mourning,
I wear the funeral of every king,
Lashing upward, gravity reversed,
The ceiling is my killing floor,
Walking on walls, walking on air,
Every surface is a prayer,

[chorus - screamed over industrial]
Assassin! In white! The sky breaks when I fight!
Assassin! In white! Gravity bends to my might!
Honorblade singing, Stormlight burning,
A weapon weeping while the world is turning!

[verse 2 - controlled]
Gavilar fell on a quiet night,
I wept as I took his life,
He whispered words I didn't understand,
The Black Sphere heavy in my hand,
Every lashing costs a piece of soul,
Every target leaves me less whole,

[chorus]
Assassin! In white! The sky breaks when I fight!
Assassin! In white! Gravity bends to my might!
Taiko thunder, industrial rain,
A holy man drowning in profane!

[bridge - shakuhachi and distortion duet]
Forgive me, forgive me,
I am the blade, not the hand,
Forgive me, forgive me,
I am truthless in this land,

[outro - silence, then single taiko hit]
The white clothes are not for stealth,
They are for the mourning of myself

tracks.title: Stone Shamans
tracks.prompt: industrial Japanese traditional fusion, ceremonial and oppressive: Noh theater percussion patterns with industrial bass drone, biwa lute samples processed through ring modulation, 85 BPM slow and ritualistic, male vocal in ceremonial chant style with industrial vocal processing, koto arpeggios glitching into machine noise
tracks.lyrics:
[verse 1 - ceremonial]
The Stone Shamans guard the truth,
Seven Honorblades hidden in the roof
Of a temple built on meadow grass,
Where no man walks with shoes of brass,

Sacred ground, they told me so,
Sacred lies, I've come to know,
They made me Truthless for the crime
Of speaking truth before its time,

[chorus - processed chant]
Stone Shamans, keepers of the lie,
Stone Shamans, taught me how to die,
The ceremony breaks the man,
The ritual executes the plan,
Shamans! Shamans! Stone and steel!
Shamans! Shamans! Kneel and kneel!

[verse 2 - building intensity]
Shin are peaceful, Shin are kind,
Shin are masters of the blind
Obedience that chains a soul
To a white stone's absolute control,
But I saw the Voidbringers return,
I spoke the truth and watched it burn,
My reward: a life of blood,
My punishment: an endless flood,

[chorus]
Stone Shamans, keepers of the lie,
Stone Shamans, taught me how to die,
The ceremony breaks the man,
The ritual executes the plan,
Shamans! Shamans! Stone and steel!
Shamans! Shamans! Kneel and kneel!

[bridge - koto solo into industrial breakdown]
The stone is a lie,
The stone is a lie,
The stone is a lie,

[outro]
And when the truth comes crashing down,
The shamans scatter, the temple drowns

tracks.title: Nightblood
tracks.prompt: industrial Japanese traditional fusion, alien and hungry: subsonic bass frequencies and dissonant industrial textures representing the sword's hunger, 95 BPM with irregular meter shifts, a duet between clean shakuhachi representing Szeth and distorted processed voice representing Nightblood, taiko drums becoming increasingly chaotic, NIN's The Fragile era production meets gagaku court music
tracks.lyrics:
[Nightblood voice - distorted, childlike]
Would you like to destroy some evil today?

[verse 1 - Szeth]
Black sword that drinks,
A thousand souls in ink,
Nightblood asks me every dawn,
Shall we destroy? Shall we move on?

The sword cannot distinguish,
Between the wicked and the righteous,
It only knows the hunger,
And the silence after thunder,

[chorus - both voices]
Destroy, destroy, destroy the evil,
(Would you like to destroy some evil?)
But who decides what evil means,
(I do, I do, I do, I do!)
Two broken weapons, one black, one white,
Consuming darkness, consuming light!

[verse 2 - Szeth]
I was the blade without a will,
Nightblood is the will without the skill
To know the difference, mercy, grace,
Together we are empty space
That swallows everything it finds,
Two hungers of two different kinds,

[chorus]
Destroy, destroy, destroy the evil,
(Would you like to destroy some evil?)
But who decides what evil means,
(I do, I do, I do, I do!)
Two broken weapons, one black, one white,
Consuming darkness, consuming light!

[bridge - industrial chaos]
The sword sings in frequencies below hearing,
The man prays in frequencies above believing,

[outro - shakuhachi and subsonic bass]
Would you like to destroy some evil today?
No, Nightblood,
Today we rest

tracks.title: Skybreaker's Oath
tracks.prompt: industrial Japanese traditional fusion, resolution and clarity: clean shamisen and shakuhachi over precise industrial beats, 105 BPM structured and purposeful, male vocal finding calm certainty, taiko accents marking oath moments, production cleaner than previous tracks representing clarity of purpose and law, Noh theater formality meeting industrial discipline, ending with solo shakuhachi over silence
tracks.lyrics:
[verse 1 - measured, certain]
I swear to follow the law,
The Fifth Ideal: I am the law,
Skybreaker's oath upon my tongue,
The hymn of justice finally sung,

No more the weapon of another's will,
No more the puppet, no more the kill
Without conviction, without creed,
I choose the law above the need,

[chorus]
I am the law, the law is me,
Skybreaker's oath has set me free,
Not free from pain, not free from cost,
But free to choose what must be lost,
Skybreaker! Skybreaker!
The truthless man becomes the truth maker!

[verse 2]
Nin-son-God showed me the way,
Justice older than the light of day,
The law is stone beneath my feet,
Shin ground made sacred, made complete,
I walked on graves but now I see
The graves were lessons leading me
To stand on something absolute,
The law, the law, the final pursuit,

[chorus]
I am the law, the law is me,
Skybreaker's oath has set me free,
Not free from pain, not free from cost,
But free to choose what must be lost,
Skybreaker! Skybreaker!
The truthless man becomes the truth maker!

[bridge - haiku, final]
Barefoot on the stone,
The white clothes clean for the first time,
Justice is my home,

[outro - solo shakuhachi fading to silence]
Truthless no more,
Truthless no more,
I am Szeth-son-son-Vallano,
And I speak only truth
